tictactoe.name: Tic-Tac-Toe
tictactoe.desc: A basic Tic-Tac-Toe game that has AI. I used old fasion JS modules to emulate OOP. This help lower the amount of boilerplate code.

blog.name: Blog
blog.desc: A blog the reaches to a Backend REST API. Uses JWT for authentication. You will find me posting about Software here!
